source_objects.title: Religion & Spirituality
source_objects.description: Learn about new religions, understand your spirituality, and much more.

items.title: Exploring  Churches: Gain Insights to Enhance Your Visit.
items.headline: Reconize what you see when you visit an English church. Find out what can be seen and somethimg of their history .
objectives_summary: Confidently identify the main features of churches as well as many of the furnishings found in them.
Explain what has been learnt to others.
Share some interesting anecdotes from history.

items.title: Come Holy Spirit

visible_instructors.title: Philip St. Romain
visible_instructors.name: Philip
visible_instructors.job_title: Spiritual director, author, teacher, Mac lover.

items.headline: An Invitation to Renewal
objectives_summary: Understand who the Holy Spirit is in the divine plan for transforming the human race and creation
Become more open to receiving and yielding to the guidance of the Spirit.
Discover which gifts of the Spirit you have been given.

items.title: Magick 102: Magickal Mechanics
items.headline: The Fundamentals and Functions of Magick
objectives_summary: What magick can do and cannot do.
12 principles for creating effective spells and rituals.
Creating effective state of mind and connection with energies and spirits to manifest your goals.

items.title: Helping Others Overcome Addictions

visible_instructors.title: Faith Counseling  Institute
visible_instructors.name: Faith Counseling
visible_instructors.job_title: Equipping the Church to Disciple the Nations

visible_instructors.title: Jim Berg
visible_instructors.name: Jim
visible_instructors.job_title: Professor of Biblical Counseling, BJU Seminary

items.headline: Core Competencies for Lay Volunteers in a Local Church-Based Addiction Recovery Discipleship Ministry
objectives_summary: Students will have learned the basics of dealing with addiction issues in counseling.

items.title: Empower the hidden YOU.
items.headline: How to transform your life by trusting your Gut Instinct.
objectives_summary: At the end of the course students will be able to develop their knowledge of energies around them and trust their gut instinct
The students will be able to understand how the aura, chakras and the brain works to do with the gut instinct.
Their are videos to follow to help identify the auric field.

items.title: The Spiritual Cause Of Your Unhappiness | Spiritual Lessons
items.headline: Develop Self-Knowing Of The Cause Of Your Unhappiness Through A Spiritual Perspective | Meditation & Workbook Included!
objectives_summary: To learn more about their life journey from a higher perspective
To learn about the cause of their unhappiness as spiritual lessons from a spiritual perspective
This is not a religious talk so use what is said here as clues to discover your own truth

items.title: Spirituality & Spiritual Healing | Mindfulness Meditation

visible_instructors.title: Kevin Kockot, M.A. Prevention & Health Promotion
visible_instructors.display_name: Kevin Kockot, M.A. Prevention & Health Promotion
visible_instructors.name: Kevin
visible_instructors.job_title: Master of Arts - Prevention & Health Promotion

items.headline: Learn How To Reconnect To Your Higher Self With A Guided Mindfulness Meditation For Spirituality & Spiritual Healing!
objectives_summary: ... Spirituality & Spiritual Healing With The Help Of Mindfulness Meditation!
... Reconnect To You Higher Self To Feel Whole, Relaxed, Calm And Happy Again!
... Basic Knowledge That Helps You To Understand The Power Of Meditation Better!

items.title: Help for depression and anxiety from a Christian perspective
items.headline: Thought Loop Therapy (Traditional Counseling plus Christian Music Therapy) PLUS Free book and 16 .mp3 songs
objectives_summary: You will have a new understanding of how God wants you to look at your struggles and problems. We use custom made music to help you replace your negative and anxiety producing thoughts.

items.title: ESOTERIC CHRISTIAN MEDITATION FOR BEGINNERS

visible_instructors.title: A.J. Parr
visible_instructors.name: A.J.
visible_instructors.job_title: Life coach, spiritual researcher & best-selling author

items.headline: The Keys of The Secret Teachings of Jesus: 12 Videos with Easy Lessons & Guided Meditations!
objectives_summary: The basic lessons and exercises you need to easily learn the basis of Esoteric Christian Meditation starting today!
The essence of the Secret Teachings of Jesus, originally imparted exclusively to his closest disciples.
The esoteric meaning of God and the origin of its many mental representations.

items.title: Divination in the Bible
items.headline: Practical Ways to Talk to God and the spirit world and tools to help
objectives_summary: Learn at least one out of nine tools to communicate with God and the spirit world
Learn some safety guidelines when working with Spirits
You will find who to ask the questions to, along with what questions to ask and different ways to ask them

items.title: The Complete Student Ministry Course 2021
items.headline: Student Ministry Nuts and Bolts.
objectives_summary: Teacher Training
Ministry
Bible

items.title: How Essential & Conjure oils are used in Wicca & Witchcraft
items.headline: Exploring many different types of oils used in Wicca from Essential, Ritual, Conjure, Carrier, Chakra and Planetary oils
objectives_summary: Students will gain a sound understanding of oils and how they are used as a part of Wiccan practice and also how they can be used in everyday life.

items.title: How To Perform Umrah - Learn Complete UMRAH  - ISLAM QURAN
items.headline: How To Perform Umrah Video Course For Men And Women. Everything You Need To Know - UMRAH In Just 1 Course - ISLAM QURAN
objectives_summary: Compulsory Acts Of Umrah
Sunnah Acts Of Umrah
Free Step By Step Reminder Book Included In this course!

items.title: Wiccan & Pagan Sabbats, Esbats & The Wheel of the Year
items.headline: Understanding the Sabbats, the festivals associated with Wheel of the Year and how they are celebrated
objectives_summary: Students will learn about the seasonal festivals and celebrations that make up the Wheel of the Year. These are called Sabbats and are explored in great detail as part of this module.

items.title: Angels 101 working with angels
items.headline: Establish a Connection with your Angel guide.. Awakening your Clairvoyant gifts
objectives_summary: learn to be an Angel Intuitive and Connect with their Angel Guides and channel guidance and oracle cards

items.title: A Beginner's Guide on How to Read your Akashic Records
items.headline: Learn how to read you Akashic Records for Self Discovery through Meditation
objectives_summary: Students will learn How to read their Akashic Records
Students will learn How to get Started with Meditation
Students will Learn about the Chakra System
